title: Dawn of the Canicene
description: “Man has had their run, maybe it's time to give someone else a go.”Ben, Spot, and Smudge are stuck between a horde and a hard place.Their enemies' horrific end game is looming, and underestimating the depths of Olga Mogevich's viciousness is a mistake they can't afford to make.To save all they hold dear the team will need to recruit a few new friends, but there's no going back once those dogs are out of the bag.In fact, they may trigger a new epoch.The Dawn of the Canicine.
author: Robert Udulutch
